description.ko: 생물 발광 유기체들이 압도적인 어둠을 밝히며 AQUA-5 기지의 숨겨진 기술을 드러내는 신비로운 심해층을 탐험하세요.
description.en: Explore the mysterious depths of the midnight zone, where bioluminescent organisms illuminate the crushing darkness, revealing the hidden technology of the AQUA-5 station.

prompt: cinematic wide shot, deep ocean floor, bioluminescent flora and fauna, futuristic underwater research station AQUA-5, glowing blue and teal accents, high pressure environment, volumetric lighting, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 render
